\title{Polyregular Model Checking \\
       main 3a357ebeb5f778f1e8dae026601d899766c97d0f \\
       2025-01-28 16:41:10 +0100
}

\author{
        Aliaume Lopez\inst{1}\orcidID{0000-0002-4205-327X} \and
        Rafał Stefański\inst{1}\orcidID{0000-0002-8439-4056}}

\date{\today}

\authorrunning{A. Lopez and R. Stefański}

\institute{University of Warsaw}

%
\maketitle              % typeset the header of the contribution
%
\begin{abstract}
    In this paper, we demonstrate how the theory of polyregular functions can be leveraged to verify simple string-to-string for-loop programs defined in a subset of Python efficiently.
Program verification and  Polyregular functions and  SMT Solver and  First order transduction
\end{abstract}
